
example( alias )
    Runs examples for a specified alias.

    Parameters
    ----------
    alias: any
        Alias (an object reference, literal, or a string).

    Examples
    --------
    > example( {{alias:@stdlib/math/base/special/sin}} )
    > example( '{{alias:@stdlib/math/base/special/sin}}' )


example( alias.<key> )
    Runs examples for a specified property.

    Parameters
    ----------
    alias.<key>: any
        Alias property (an object reference, literal, or a string).

    Examples
    --------
    > example( {{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}.from )
    > example( '{{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}.from' )
